page.title: 11TRANSPORT, DEEPCAR & WORTLEY
page.content: {RAIL:}Closure of the electrified Woodhead route and rerouting of Sheffield-Huddersfield traffic via Barnsley and Penistone (l983) closed this section through the old Deepcar and Wortley stations except for B.S.C. traffic from Stocksbridge Railway Co. line. Nearest station:Chapeltown(6mls) {BUS:}South Yorks. P.T.E. recently expanded and improved services between Sheffield and Stocksbridge via Deepcar estates. Routes include: 57,58,X66,X67 and 381/384 on Stocksbridge/Penistone/ Barnsley circular. Also X48 express to Manchester, 6 & 400 Summer services. Wortley served by 239(Sheffield- Huddersfield/Halifax) and 73 & 80. {Survey:}79% own cars. 37% never use bus. 95% "satisfactory/v.good service" {Fare:}11p adult/4p child to Sheffield. {Bypass:}Work has begun on Liverpool- Skegness Trunk Road linking A616 & M1.
